structure.title: IN THE HIGH COURT OF BOMBAY

content.facts: The petitioner entered into a contract with the respondent for supply of goods. The respondent failed to deliver the goods within the stipulated time and refused to refund the advance payment.
content.grounds: Breach of contract under Section 73 of Indian Contract Act, 1872. The respondent has committed fundamental breach of contract.
content.relief: Refund of advance payment with interest at 12% per annum from the date of payment.
content.arguments: The petitioner has fulfilled all obligations under the contract. The respondent's failure to deliver constitutes breach of contract.
content.conclusion: The petitioner is entitled to relief as prayed for.

raw_data.title: ABC Company vs XYZ Corporation
raw_data.content:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF BOMBAY

FACTS:
The petitioner entered into a contract...

GROUNDS:

PRAYER:
